other: This script is likely using the SLURM workload manager to run a series of tasks on a high-performance computing (HPC) cluster.
The script appears to be converting a Bloom model checkpoint to a PyTorch format and then running evaluations on different tasks.
The script also runs a separate evaluation using the lm-evaluation-harness tool.
The script uses conda environments for different purposes, including model conversion, evaluation, and lm-evaluation-harness.
The script uses a specific GPU type (A100) and specific partitions on the HPC cluster.
The script leverages a variety of resources including CPUs, GPUs, disk space, and pre-trained models.
